function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of global leadership in responding to the COVID-19 Pandemic","Impact":"Exacerbation of the present humanitarian crisis","Mitigation":"Appointing effective global leaders and strengthening international cooperation","Technologies":"Global communication and coordination platforms","People":"Global population","Owner":"World leaders and international organizations"},{"Description":"Undermining of the WHO and inadequate global responses to the COVID-19 Pandemic","Impact":"Ineffective control of the spread of the virus and failure to provide adequate resources for mitigation","Mitigation":"Restoring trust in the WHO and improving global response strategies","Technologies":"Health monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"WHO and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Over-exploitation of forest and other ecologies leading to imbalance in nature","Impact":"Exacerbation of the current crisis and potential for future disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Sustainable forest management and conservation practices","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and predictive modeling","People":"Global population","Owner":"Environmental agencies and conservation organizations"}]}
